divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work in downtown Medford, Oregon--Peach St & West Main St. I was standing outside in the early morning just as the sky was becoming light. There were misty little clouds. I looked up to my right and saw a silver colored space ship disappear into the atmosphere. It had to be traveling at a terrific speed because it just shot into nothing. It was my first sighting and I will never forget it.I have never seen anything move that fast.
Summary: silver colored craft -shiny looking-round with mound on top
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around January 19th 1999
